channel.title: Modules on Data Science for Biotechnology
channel.description: Recent content in Modules on Data Science for Biotechnology

item.title: Week 01
item.description: Week 1: Introduction to the Course Links Class Slides Data Science vs. Computer Science Jamboard Biotechnology Jamboard Jupyter Notebook Setup Creating a GitHub Repository Kaggle Datasets Creating a Simple Linear Regression using sklearn Jupyter Notebook Installation OPTION 1: Anaconda > Jupyter Notebooks $ conda install -c conda-forge notebook OPTION 2: If you already have Python installed, you can use a software management tool called pip. $ pip3 install jupyter OR

item.title: Week 02
item.description: Week 2: Exploratory Data Analysis Links Class Slides Life Expectancy Dataset Kaggle Datasets Introduction to Pandas Dataframes Google Colab Demo EDA Checklist What question(s) are you trying to solve (or prove right / wrong)? What kind of data do you have and how do you treat different types? What’s missing from the data and how do you deal with it? Where are the outliers and why should you care about them?

item.title: Week 03
item.description: Week 3: Data Visualization Links Class Slides Guest Speaker: Megan Monroe Profile Personal Wesbite EventFlow New York Times covid-19-data

item.title: Week 04
item.description: Week 4: Neural Networks Links Class Slides Guest Speaker: Soha Hassoun Profile Lab Website Slides TensorFlow Playground Neural Network Playground

item.title: Week 05
item.description: Week 5: Imaging and Diagnostics Links Class Slides Guest Speaker: Fiorenzo Omenetto Profile Lab Website TED Talk Recent & Relevant Research Article Video Digit Recognition with Neural Networks Playground Eyes of Watson: IBM Research Bringing AI to Radiology Watson Visual Recognition Playgrounds 2D Visualization of a CNN 3D Visualization of a CNN ConvNet Playground: Image Similarity Search Info and FAQ CNN Explainer Demo Video Imaging Datasets binarized_mnist: Handwritten Digits bccd: Blood Cells Detection celeb_a: CelebFaces Attributes Dataset aflw2k3d: 3D Facial Landmarks coil100: 7200 Color Images of 100 Objects Cancer Imaging Archive Phantom FDA COVID-19 Radiology Dataset (Chest X-Ray and CT)

item.title: Week 06
item.description: Week 6: Deep Learning & Computer Vision Links Class Slides Guest Lecture by Nicolai Frost Jacobsen (Corti AI) Mid-Semester Feedback Survey Kaggle Dataset DeepFakes Google Cloud Vision Playground Demo (function(){var qs,js,q,s,d=document,gi=d.getElementById,ce=d.createElement,gt=d.getElementsByTagName,id='typef_orm',b='https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/share.typeform.com/';if(!gi.call(d,id)){js=ce.call(d,'script');js.id=id;js.src=b+'widget.js';q=gt.call(d,'script')[0];q.parentNode.insertBefore(js,q)}})()

item.title: Week 08
item.description: Week 8: Genetic Algorithms & Gene Sequencing Links Class Slides Bioinformatics Jamboard BioPython Documentation Gene Sequencing Workshop Jupyter Notebook Genetic Algorithm Walkers (thanks James C!)

item.title: Week 10
item.description: Week 10: Data Ethics, Cybersecurity, and Social Justice Links Class Slides Project Proposals

item.title: Week 11
item.description: Week 11: Ethics (continued) and Breaking into Data Science Links Class Slides Data Ethics Film Discussions The Great Hack Are there any benefits to social media marketing? Is all data collection unethical? Do you think psychological / behavioral analytics is net positive or net negative? Do you think that social media has shaped your political views? If so, how is that different than your closest friends and family shaping your political views?
